channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Multi-morbidity Requires Two Health Systems, not One

item.title: On super hot days, this insurance plan pays out cash for lost wages
item.description: It's called parametric insurance, it offers protection for climate-related wage losses and it's gaining ground in India.

item.title: How a third parent's DNA can prevent an inherited disease
item.description: An experimental technique that patches defective DNA with donated genetic material helped families at risk of passing rare illnesses to their children...

item.title: In a state with high maternal mortality, a woman fights to open a birth center
item.description: Rising maternal and infant mortality rates are making birth a more risky proposition in the U.S. We'll visit a community in Georgia where one woman is...

item.title: Trump toughens fentanyl smuggling penalties but public health grants are withheld

item.title: How To Find the Right Medical Rehab Services
item.description: Specialized hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, and home health agencies provide rehab therapy. Insurers may limit the services you can get.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: “Health Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from the KFF Health News newsroom to the airwaves each week.
